data.title: Featured DJ: Michael Gray — Vanessa Mallinson
data.meta_description: Michael Gray is a British DJ Producer, and is also one half of the remixing duo ‘Full Intention’ with Jon Pearn.  Full Intention has been at the forefront of dance music since the early 90s.  They have produced many successful dance tracks as well as notable remixes for Jennifer Lopez, Mariah Carey,
data.text:
Michael Gray is a British DJ Producer, and is also one half of the remixing duo ‘Full Intention’ with Jon Pearn. Full Intention has been at the forefront of dance music since the early 90s. They have produced many successful dance tracks as well as notable remixes for Jennifer Lopez, Mariah Carey, Jamiroquai and Whitney Houston.

In 2004 Full Intention was nominated for a Grammy for their club mix of George Michael’s “Amazing”.

Michael Gray is also a successful artist in his own right with worldwide hits such as “The Weekend” in 2004 and “Borderline” in 2006 and Full Intention’s remix of Paloma Faith’s single “Just Be”.

He has a love of Disco and his remix of Sylvester’s “You make me feel” was one of the best-selling dance tracks of 2019. In 2020 he worked with Dr Packer on the remix of: Bobby D’Ambrosio’s “Runaway Love” and has collaborated on remixes of his acclaimed single “The Weekend” with Mousse T and Low Steppa.

In 2021 Michael remixed a new version of “Bodyswerve (featuring Sian-Lee)” by Phil Lorraine and James Kerr released on House Trained.

Michael releases records on his own label Sultra and frequently remixes and releases records on Defected, Glitterbox & Soulfuric.

DISCOGRAPHY

“The Weekend” – (2004)
